about.title: Crafting Beautiful Landscapes Since 2018
about.story: What started as a passion for transforming outdoor spaces has grown into Columbus's most trusted year-round lawn care service. At Lawn Care 365 LLC, we believe every property deserves the attention to detail that makes it stand out. Our team combines years of expertise with cutting-edge equipment to deliver results that exceed expectations, every day of the year.
about.mission: To provide exceptional year-round lawn care services that enhance the beauty and value of every property we touch, while building lasting relationships with our clients through reliability, quality, and integrity.

values.title: Uncompromising Quality
values.description: We never cut corners, only grass. Every project receives meticulous attention to detail, 365 days a year.

values.title: Dependable Service
values.description: We show up on time, every time, every season. Your schedule and property are our priorities year-round.

values.title: Professional Expertise
values.description: Years of experience and continuous training ensure superior results on every job, in every season.

values.title: Customer First
values.description: Your satisfaction drives everything we do. We're not done until you're thrilled with the results.

services.name: Professional Lawn Mowing
services.shortDescription: Precision cutting for a perfectly manicured lawn, all year long
services.fullDescription: Our professional mowing service goes beyond basic cutting. We use commercial-grade equipment to ensure precise, even cuts that promote healthy grass growth. Each visit includes edging, trimming, and cleanup for a pristine finish, no matter the season.
features: Clean edging along walkways and beds

services.name: Landscape Maintenance
services.shortDescription: Keep your entire landscape looking its best year-round
services.fullDescription: Comprehensive care for all your landscape features. From pruning and mulching to seasonal cleanups, we maintain the health and beauty of your entire outdoor space throughout all seasons.

services.name: Lawn Treatment & Fertilization
services.shortDescription: Science-backed treatments for a lush, healthy lawn year-round
services.fullDescription: Our tailored treatment programs address your lawn's specific needs through every season. We analyze soil conditions and grass type to create a customized fertilization and pest control plan that delivers vibrant, healthy results.

services.name: Irrigation Services
services.shortDescription: Smart watering solutions for optimal lawn health
services.fullDescription: Efficient irrigation systems that conserve water while keeping your lawn perfectly hydrated throughout the year. We install, repair, and maintain systems to ensure your landscape gets exactly what it needs in every season.

services.name: Hardscaping & Design
services.shortDescription: Transform your outdoor space with elegant structures
services.fullDescription: Create stunning outdoor living areas with professional hardscaping. From patios and walkways to retaining walls and fire pits, we build durable, beautiful features that enhance your property's value and enjoyment.

services.name: Seasonal Services
services.shortDescription: Year-round care for every season's unique needs
services.fullDescription: Specialized services tailored to each season's demands. From spring cleanups to fall leaf removal and winter preparations, we keep your property pristine all year long with our comprehensive seasonal care.

steps.title: Free Consultation
steps.description: Contact us for a no-obligation assessment of your property. We'll discuss your vision and specific needs.

steps.title: Custom Proposal
steps.description: Receive a detailed, transparent quote tailored to your property's unique requirements and your budget.

steps.title: Scheduled Service
steps.description: We arrive on time with professional equipment and get to work transforming your outdoor space.

steps.title: Quality Guarantee
steps.description: Walk your property with us. We're not satisfied until you're absolutely thrilled with the results.

testimonials.name: Sarah Mitchell
testimonials.text: Lawn Care 365 transformed our overgrown yard into a stunning landscape. Their year-round attention to detail is unmatched, and they're always on time. Best decision we made for our home!

testimonials.name: Michael Roberts
testimonials.text: Professional, reliable, and reasonably priced. My lawn has never looked better. The team is courteous and always leaves the property cleaner than they found it, every season.

testimonials.name: Jennifer Thompson
testimonials.text: After struggling with brown patches for years, Lawn Care 365's year-round treatment program brought my lawn back to life. It's now the envy of the neighborhood. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: David Chen
testimonials.text: The irrigation system they installed has saved us so much time and water. Plus, our lawn stays green even in the hottest months. Excellent work from start to finish.

faq.question: How often should I have my lawn mowed?
faq.answer: Most lawns in the Columbus area benefit from weekly mowing during the growing season (spring through fall). During peak summer growth, weekly service ensures your grass stays at optimal height. In slower growth periods, bi-weekly service may be sufficient. We'll assess your lawn and recommend the best year-round schedule.

faq.question: Do you provide free estimates?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer free, no-obligation consultations and estimates for all our services. We'll visit your property, assess your needs, and provide a detailed, transparent quote. No surprises, no hidden fees.

faq.question: What areas do you service?
faq.answer: We proudly serve Columbus, GA and surrounding areas within a 25-mile radius, including Fort Benning, Phenix City, and surrounding Georgia communities. If you're unsure whether we cover your area, give us a call and we'll let you know.

faq.question: Are you licensed and insured?
faq.answer: Yes, Lawn Care 365 LLC is fully licensed and insured. We carry comprehensive liability insurance and workers' compensation coverage to protect both our team and your property.

faq.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the service?
faq.answer: Your satisfaction is our top priority. If you're not completely happy with our work, let us know immediately and we'll return to make it right at no additional charge. We stand behind every service with our 100% satisfaction guarantee.

faq.question: Do you offer seasonal contracts or one-time services?
faq.answer: We offer both! Many clients prefer year-round contracts for regular maintenance, which often come with preferred pricing. We also provide one-time services for special projects, cleanups, or occasional maintenance. Whatever works best for you.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept cash, checks, and all major credit cards for your convenience. For recurring services, we can also set up automatic billing to make things even easier.

faq.question: How far in advance should I schedule services?
faq.answer: For regular maintenance like mowing, we recommend calling as early as possible to secure your preferred day and time. For larger projects or seasonal services, 2-3 weeks advance notice is ideal, though we'll do our best to accommodate urgent needs.
